lead_paragraph: Felix Perez, 37, was also charged with criminal possession of stolen property and resisting arrest, the authorities said. He remained hospitalized.

headline.print_headline: Man Shot by the Police in Queens Is Charged With Burglary
headline.main: Man Shot by Officer in Queens Apartment Is Charged With Burglary

snippet: Felix Perez, 37, was also charged with criminal possession of stolen property and resisting arrest, the authorities said. He remained hospitalized....
abstract: Felix Perez is arrested and charged with breaking into home in Maspeth, Queens, where he was shot by New York City police officer in altercation.
